info.official_title: A Real-world Non-interventional Observational Study to Evaluate Effectiveness and Safety of Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors (TKIs) in the Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer Complicated With Brain Metastases
info.exclusion_criteria: No exclusion criteria are included in the study given that the study is designed as non-interventional and all the treatments followed real-world clinical practice and experiences of clinical physicians.

inclusion_lines.line: * The patients were treated with lung cancer and were enrolled from Jan 2013 to Jun 2017

criterions.exact_snippets: patients were treated with lung cancer

inclusion_lines.line: * The patients with advanced (Clinical stage: Phase IV) non-small cell lung cancer who have complete core health medical records (HMRs);

criterions.exact_snippets: advanced (Clinical stage: Phase IV) non-small cell lung cancer

inclusion_lines.line: * The patients who are observed with brain metastases diagnosed by imaging methods;

criterions.exact_snippets: brain metastases diagnosed by imaging methods

inclusion_lines.line: * The patients who have complete clinical data for diagnosis time of brain metastases, and overall survival/effectiveness;

criterions.exact_snippets: complete clinical data for diagnosis time of brain metastases
criterions.criterion: clinical data for diagnosis time of brain metastases

criterions.exact_snippets: complete clinical data for ... overall survival/effectiveness

inclusion_lines.line: * The patients who are administered with tyrosine kinase inhibitors only or combination therapies of tyrosine kinase inhibitors;

criterions.exact_snippets: combination therapies of tyrosine kinase inhibitors
criterions.criterion: combination therapies with tyrosine kinase inhibitors

exclusion_lines.line: No exclusion criteria are included in the study given that the study is designed as non-interventional and all the treatments followed real-world clinical practice and experiences of clinical physicians.

criterions.exact_snippets: No exclusion criteria are included in the study
